entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
